compareTo

public int compareTo(net.sourceforge.waters.model.des.TransitionProxy trans)
Compares this arc to another arc. The event is compared first, then the toState and last the fromState.

getProxyInterface

public java.lang.Class<net.sourceforge.waters.model.des.TransitionProxy> getProxyInterface()
Description copied from interface: net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy
Returns the most specific proxy interface implemented by this object. This method must return one of the leaf interfaces of the proxy hierarchy, e.g. EventProxy, not any specific implementation class. This is used by the different equality methods to ensure that objects from different implementations can be considered equal.

Specified by:
getProxyInterface in interface net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy

equalsByContents

public boolean equalsByContents(net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy partner)
Description copied from interface: net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy
Checks whether two elements are equal. This method implements content-based equality, i.e., two elements will be equal if their contents are the same. It considers all structural contents of the object, except for geometry information.

Specified by:
equalsByContents in interface net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy
See Also:
equalsWithGeometry(), Proxy.hashCodeByContents()

equalsWithGeometry

public boolean equalsWithGeometry(net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy partner)
Description copied from interface: net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy
Checks whether two elements are equal and have the same geometry information. This method implements content-based equality, i.e., two elements will be equal if their contents are the same. In contrast to the equalsByContents() method, this method also takes the layout information of graphical objects such as nodes and edges into account.

Specified by:
equalsWithGeometry in interface net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy
See Also:
equalsByContents(), Proxy.hashCodeWithGeometry()

hashCodeByContents

public int hashCodeByContents()
Description copied from interface: net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy
Computes a hash code based on this object's contents. This method is used to compute a hash code to match the equality defined by the equalsByContents() method. All structural contents of the object, except for geometry information, are taken into account.

Specified by:
hashCodeByContents in interface net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy
See Also:
equalsByContents(), Proxy.hashCodeWithGeometry()

hashCodeWithGeometry

public int hashCodeWithGeometry()
Description copied from interface: net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy
Computes a hash code based on this object's contents and geometry information. This method is used to compute a hash code to match the equality defined by the equalsWithGeometry() method. All structural contents of the object including geometry information, are taken into account.

Specified by:
hashCodeWithGeometry in interface net.sourceforge.waters.model.base.Proxy
